item.title: [PI] Vesta Spear(Infinite Special Attack)[PI]
item.dc:creator: @divinityms divinityms
item.description:
@divinityms wrote:

I am coding the server-sided part of my Vesta Spear, and I am currently having one problem with it. The weapon is fine but the problem is when you use the special attack the special attack percentage does not decrease at all.

ItemAssistant.java

case 13905: // vesta spear c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7599); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7611); break;

CombatAssistant.java

case 13905: // vesta spear c.startAnimation(6502); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); c.specDamage = 1.65; c.specAccuracy = 2.75; break;
Any help would be appreciated...

Read full topic
